ing: 1 (16 ounce) can crushed pineapple, well drained
des: "This is a simple, fast, and easy holiday cheese ball recipe. It will remind you of your childhood if you are of a vintage age. If you loved the taste of KraftÂ® pineapple cheese spread on a RitzÂ® cracker this will really bring back comfort food memories. Makes a great potluck dish for parties. This is a big favorite at the holidays. I like to serve this with Chicken in a BiscuitÂ® type of cracker, but your favorite crackers will do very nicely."
ins:
Mix cream cheese and pineapple together in a bowl; form into a ball. Roll ball in walnut pieces until ball is completely coated.
Set ball on a piece of plastic wrap. Wrap plastic wrap tightly around ball and place in a small bowl. Refrigerate ball to allow flavors to blend, at least 30 minutes.
Serve cheese ball on a bed of chopped parsley.
